{"id":1112764866,"question_id":3231,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1701765191,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1112764866/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Coins to be Added","memory":"55.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumAddedCoins(int[] coins, int target) {\n        Arrays.sort(coins);\n       int len = coins.length;\n\n        // https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f0zzWwclhYQ\n\n        long curr=0;\n        int res=0;\n        int idx=0;\n        // [0, 1)\n\n        while(curr<target){\n\n            if(idx<len && coins[idx]<= curr+1){\n                curr+= coins[idx];\n                idx++;\n            }else{\n                res++;\n                curr += curr+1;\n            }\n\n        }\n\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-coins-to-be-added","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
